semantic_identifier: [GOLD-151]: Add segment/ICP context inputs to priority scoring pipeline
title: Add segment/ICP context inputs to priority scoring pipeline

sections.text: Extend the priority scoring data model and ingestion pipeline to attach customer segment and ICP fit attributes to each issue object (and aggregated theme). Pull segment/ICP from CRM + Customer_Analyzer with clear fallbacks when data is missing or conflicting. Persist these fields so downstream scoring and UI can reliably reference segment/ICP context without re-fetching on every score calculation.
